original_text: After the men had gone away, Joseph had a dream. In the dream, he saw one of the Lord God's angels. The angel said to him, ‘Herod will look for the child, so that his soldiers can kill him. You must get up and take the child and his mother with you. Go immediately to Egypt. I will tell you when you can return again. You must remain there until then.’
korean_text: 그들이 떠난 후에 주의 사자가 요셉에게 현몽하여 이르되 헤롯이 아기를 찾아 죽이려 하니 일어나 아기와 그의 어머니를 데리고 애굽으로 피하여 내가 네게 이르기까지 거기 있으라 하시니

sentences.original_text: After the men had gone away,
he saw one of the Lord God's angels.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 주 하나님의 천사 중 한 명을 보았습니다.

sentences.original_text: Herod will look for the child,
so that his soldiers can kill him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 군사들이 그를 죽일 수 있도록.

sentences.original_text: and take the child and his mother with you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아기와 그의 어머니를 데리고 가야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: You must remain there until then.
